diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Cholecystitis, Cholelithiasis, Urinary retention/urethral stricture s/p dilation
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Patient presented with RUQ abdominal pain, nausea, and chills, which are indicative of possible cholecystitis. History of gallstones, along with ultrasound showing cholelithiasis without wall thickening, and alleviation of pain with morphine support the diagnosis.
